title: War Pick +1
content:
War Pick +1 Uncommon 2~9 Damage 1d8 +1 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: When swung, the arc of this weapon perfectly matches the curve of its beak-like pick. War Pick 0.9 65

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

When swung, the arc of this weapon perfectly matches the curve of its beak-like pick.

War Pick +1 is one of the Martial Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and
